languages.text: "Вне дежурств мы тренируемся, заботимся о снаряжении и молимся в регламентированные интервалы".
"When we're off-duty, we train, maintain our equipment, and pray at regulation-approved intervals."
languages.original_text: "Вне дежурств мы тренируемся, заботимся о снаряжении и молимся в регламентированные интервалы".

traits.locale_text: "When off duty, we train, maintain our equipment, and pray at regulation-approved intervals."
traits.speaker: OfficersDeckGuard_BathFemale

traits.locale_text: "When off duty, we train, maintain our equipment, and pray at regulation-approved intervals."
traits.speaker: OfficersDeckGuard_BathFemale

traits.locale_text: "When we're off-duty, we train, maintain our equipment, and pray at regulation-approved intervals."

traits.locale_text: "When we're off-duty, we train, maintain our equipment, and pray at regulation-approved intervals."

traits.locale_text: "When we're off-duty, we train, maintain our equipment, and pray at regulation-approved intervals."
traits.speaker: OfficersDeckGuard_BathFemale

languages.text: « Lorsque nous ne sommes pas en service, nous nous entraînons, nous entretenons notre équipement et nous prions aux intervalles approuvés par le règlement. »
languages.original_text: "When we're off-duty, we train, maintain our equipment, and pray at regulation-approved intervals."

traits.locale_text: « Lorsque nous ne sommes pas en service, nous nous entraînons, nous entretenons notre équipement et nous prions aux intervalles approuvés par le règlement. »
traits.speaker: OfficersDeckGuard_BathFemale

languages.text: «Cuando no estamos de servicio, entrenamos, mantenemos nuestro equipamiento y rezamos en los intervalos establecidos por las regulaciones».
languages.original_text: "When we're off-duty, we train, maintain our equipment, and pray at regulation-approved intervals."

traits.locale_text: «Cuando no estamos de servicio, entrenamos, mantenemos nuestro equipamiento y rezamos en los intervalos establecidos por las regulaciones».
traits.speaker: OfficersDeckGuard_BathFemale

languages.text: “空闲的时候，我们会进行训练、维护装备、在批准的时间段内进行祈祷。”
languages.original_text: "When we're off-duty, we train, maintain our equipment, and pray at regulation-approved intervals."

traits.locale_text: “空闲的时候，我们会进行训练、维护装备、在批准的时间段内进行祈祷。”
traits.speaker: OfficersDeckGuard_BathFemale

languages.text: 「非番のときは、訓練し、装備を整備し、規則で認められた間隔で祈りを捧げる。
languages.original_text: "When we're off-duty, we train, maintain our equipment, and pray at regulation-approved intervals."

traits.locale_text: 「非番のときは、訓練し、装備を整備し、規則で認められた間隔で祈りを捧げる。
traits.speaker: OfficersDeckGuard_BathFemale

languages.text: "Wenn wir nicht im Dienst sind, üben wir, warten unsere Ausrüstung und beten in vorgeschriebenen Abständen."
languages.original_text: "When we're off-duty, we train, maintain our equipment, and pray at regulation-approved intervals."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn wir nicht im Dienst sind, üben wir, warten unsere Ausrüstung und beten in vorgeschriebenen Abständen."
traits.speaker: OfficersDeckGuard_BathFemale

languages.text: "Vazife başında olmadığımızda talim yaparız, ekipmanlarımızı kontrol ederiz ve düzenlemelerce belirlenmiş aralıklarla dua ederiz."
languages.original_text: "When we're off-duty, we train, maintain our equipment, and pray at regulation-approved intervals."
